room_title: Escape room "Heroes" by Fuzzy Logic Escape Room in Chicago
review: Ian made sure we had a great time. Will do again for sure

room_title: Escape room "Heroes" by Fuzzy Logic Escape Room in Chicago
review: Amy was a great host and gave us just enough hints to make the experience fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Heroes" by Fuzzy Logic Escape Room in Chicago
review: Took my daughter's softball team here for a party/team building exercise.   They all had a good time and the helpers did a nice job of making them work but giving them enough clues so they could finish in time.    Definitely recommended!
